title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 822.3 - Appointment of psychiatrists or physicians
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 822.3 - Appointment of psychiatrists or physicians

State Regulations

Psychiatrists or physicians employed
at a State institution shall not be assigned by the court pursuant to
subdivision 3 of section
35
of the

Judiciary Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
822.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
